attributes.action: Dress down for all school children this Friday
attributes.additional_details: Everyone needs different focuses right now; turning negatives into positives is the best way, and I think this does that in a simple way which kids will love, everywhere.
attributes.background: Can I please put forward a motion of dress down this Friday to make it fun, almost like a last day of term, rather than heading into the unknown....

rejection.details:
Decisions about school uniform are a matter for individual schools, not the Government or Parliament.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
